thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: OCC Chief Wants to Cater Better to ‘Our Customers…the Banks’

author: Lalita Clozel
title: OCC Chief Wants to Cater Better to ‘Our Customers…the Banks’
text:
WASHINGTON—Comptroller of the Currency Joseph Otting wants his banking agency to be more responsive to “our customers, which are the banks.”
Mr. Otting, a former banking executive now supervising his former peers, on Monday told a community-banking conference that he was working to reduce his agency’s budget and run it in a “more cost-efficient and a more effective manner.”
